avalancheActivity.highlights: Updated 19.12 at 8:30: There is little snow in the area. Small unstable wind slabs might build up at high elevation due to snowfall and E snowdrift.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Most of the snow melted in thaw last week, and the area had little snow until this weekend. Since Sunday 15.12, there has been some snowfall, and now the mountains are white, but there is still not much snow. Small, layered slabs may exist in gullies and other places where snow has accumulated. New small wind slabs might form in leeward slopes due to snow showers E wind on Thursday.

travelAdvisory.comment: Widely there is little snow, some places hardpacked old snow in mountains. Avalanche danger is generally considered low, but unstable wind slabs might exist in isolated gullies at high elevation.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Widely there is little snow, some places hardpacked old snow in mountains. Avalanche danger is generally considered low, but unstable wind slabs might exist in isolated gullies at high elevation.

weatherForecast.highlights: Á fimmtudag á að snjóa í fjöll og skafa undan austanátt. Hægari og breytilegar áttir í kjölfarið með minni úrkomu, en þó einhver éljagangur.

avalancheActivity.highlights: There is little snow in the area. Small unstable slabs might build up due to E and NE snowfall on Thursday evening and Friday.

snowpackStructure.highlights: After the thaw on Sunday, December 8th, there was little snow left. Since then, there has been some snowfall, but there is still not much snow in the mountains. Small, layered slabs may exist in gullies and other places where snow has accumulated. New small wind slabs might form in leeward slopes due to snow showers and E-NE winds on Thursday evening and Friday.

travelAdvisory.comment: Widely there is little snow, some places hardpacked old snow in mountains. Avalanche danger is generally considered low, but unstable wind slabs might exist in isolated gullies at high elevation.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Widely there is little snow, some places hardpacked old snow in mountains. Avalanche danger is generally considered low, but unstable wind slabs might exist in isolated gullies at high elevation.

weatherForecast.highlights: Úrkomulítið fram eftir fimmtudegi en svo éljagangur í A og NA áttum. Hiti um eða rétt undir frostmarki.

avalancheActivity.highlights: A lot of snow melted during thaw last week and the snow is more stable, especially at lower elevations. Intermittent snow in the next few days.

snowpackStructure.highlights: A lot of snow melted during thaw last week and the old snow widely considered stable. Some weak layers could be present at very high elevations. Some intermittent snow is forecasted but it is not likely to cause increased avalanche danger.

travelAdvisory.comment: Widely there is little snow, some places hardpacked old snow in mountains. Avalanche danger is generally considered low, but unstable wind slabs might exist in isolated gullies at high elevation.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Widely there is little snow, some places hardpacked old snow in mountains. Avalanche danger is generally considered low, but unstable wind slabs might exist in isolated gullies at high elevation.

weatherForecast.highlights: Fremur hægra breytilegar áttir næstu daga og snjókoma með köflum. Hlýnar dálítið á föstudag.

avalancheActivity.comment: A small avalanche fell in Grænafell last week.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Snowfall is predicted on Friday during easterly winds so windslabs could form, mostly on westerly aspect. The old snow is stiff in most places but still layered at high elevations.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snowfall is predicted on Friday during easterly winds so windslabs could form, mostly on westerly aspect. The old snow is stiff in most places but still layered at high elevations. A snowpit made in Drangagil above Neskaupstaður was made on December 17th and showed a steep temperature gradient in the upper layers of the snowpack. A compression test showed a non-planar break at 12 cm at 11 taps.

travelAdvisory.comment: Widely there is little snow, some places hardpacked old snow in mountains. Avalanche danger is generally considered low, but unstable wind slabs might exist in isolated gullies at high elevation.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Widely there is little snow, some places hardpacked old snow in mountains. Avalanche danger is generally considered low, but unstable wind slabs might exist in isolated gullies at high elevation.

weatherForecast.highlights: Úrkomulítið á fimmtudag en um kvöldið snýst í SA/A-átt með snjókomu til fjalla en rigningu eða slyddu á láglendi. Útlit fyrir norðlæga eða breytilega átt á laugardag með dálítilli úrkomu.
